body.name: Genuine Joe Liquid Hand Soap with Skin Conditioner, 1 gallon Bottle, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 46 mins.
features: Thick, high foam for luxurious handwashing
Gentle on your hands - made with the mildest detergents, emollients and skin conditioners
body.description: Thick, high-foaming hand soap is formulated with the mildest detergents, emollients and skin conditioners. Professional-strength formula is ready to use in your soap dispenser. It is also EcoLogo certified. The pH level is between 6.5 and 7.5. Angled handle near top allows easy pouring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With an expanding line of 900+ cleaning, breakroom and facility essentials, Genuine Joe delivers exactly what you’re looking for – quality and value. The Genuine Joe cleaning, breakroom and facility supplies product line was developed to meet your needs. Why? Because Joe knows that the success of your business is important. Choose from our broad selection of product categories for every application: paper products, breakroom supplies, office wellness, cleaning solutions, facility maintenance and much more. From paper towels and mop buckets to cups and disposable gloves, Genuine Joe has the solutions you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, cleans well.
reviews.reviewText: I normally do not buy hand soap for home use in such large containers. When the pandemic hit, we were washing our hands more, doing more cooking, cleaning in general, and shopping at the grocery stores less often (more carts, fewer trips). Seemed like we were always running low on soaps (I don't like to use dish soap on my hands because it is usually too drying). Honestly, I expected this soap to be about the same scenario because the price point was low for the amount you get in bulk. I was pleasantly surprised that it was creamy and not drying with a pleasant scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have no complaints about this soap!
reviews.reviewText: I've gone through a gallon of this soap and just ordered another! The price is right and the quality is good. This soap is mild and not too smelly. It would work great in retail places but I just use it in my house. I constantly am washing my hands and this soap causes no problems for my skin. Other soaps cause bumps or dryness but this one seems well balanced in everything. I have no complaints about this soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light Pink Pearl Rose Smell Price Fluctuates
reviews.reviewText: The bottle I received was a light pink pearl color, the fragrance is a light rose smell, and it has decent suds. The bright pink in most dispensers are similar but with a citrus fragrance. Lots of hand soaps cause my hands to itch but my hands have felt just fine, I also the rose smell is almost like smelling a rose so its nice, not super manly but it does not stick around after you rinse it off. I use a 30oz pump dispenser mounted in my bathroom, you can pick them up for about $10-15 and will dispense any liquid soaps. The price must fluctuate on this product, I paid $8.53, the day it arrived it cost $13.30, a week later when I write this is now $12.32.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent soap at decent price, but you don't really get a gallon.
reviews.reviewText: Soap seems fine. Scent is very mild...almost no scent. Gave a lower rating because the jug wasn't as full as the photo shows, and I don't think it's really one gallon: my fill level was a good inch lower than shown in the product photo, plus the jug barely weighs 6 lbs even though the Amazon description says it should weigh 7.14 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I started using this during the COVID shortages and I expect to continue for a long time. It works great as a hand soap and does not irritate sensitive skin. I can even dilute it and use it in one of those foaming dispensers. Highly recommended. 😎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
reviews.reviewText: i really like this soap. i purchased it 3 years ago for a in-sink soap dispenser and after several refills i still really like this soap. it has a very mild fragrance and very mild detergent effect.if you're trying to wash off car grease this wouldn't be a good choice, but for the kitchen and bathroom this is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars CAUTION, they are NOT sending the same soap product anymore. Relabeled pink lotion (watery) soap
reviews.reviewText: I have been ordering this "all purpose skin cleanser soap" for 1 yr+ for my business, and recently they have started sending a different soap product: "pink lotion soap." Which is basically water, with a very small amount of soap in it. I thought it was a fluke the first time, but I've ordered it twice now and both times received this incorrect cheap soap. Pink Lotion Soap is actually another Geniune Joe product with product number 02107. But now it looks like they have relabeled the "All Purpose Skin Cleanser" 02105, as Pink Lotion Soap. Just take a look at the photos here to see. So Buyer Beware, you'll be receiving watery bright pink soap, instead of the listed product. 1/10 would not recommend this anymore.***update: the photo with two soap bottles shows the original product on left, and then on the right it shows the new product they are sending, with the same item number there on both bottles, but NOT the same product. ***
